channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy and her dad are having a relaxing day boating on the lake. They fish out an old glittery mirror from the bottom of the lake, but it belongs to a mermaid who would like it back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.
